example.eg: Clouds were visible beyond the mountains.
example.egtrans: 可以看到山那边的云彩。

example.eg: The hotel cannot hold reservations beyond seventy-two hours.
example.egtrans: 这家旅馆保留预定的时间不能超过七十二小时。

example.eg: The solution to your problems is beyond my field of expertise.
example.egtrans: 如何解决你的问题超出了我的专业领域。

example.eg: The laws of gravity are beyond dispute.
example.egtrans: 万有引力定律无可争议。

example.eg: Beyond that, I don't know what to say.
example.egtrans: 除此之外，我不知道还能说些什么。

example.eg: She's changed beyond recognition from all the stress of her life.
example.egtrans: 生活的种种压力让她面目全非。

example.eg: Why she ever left him is beyond me.
example.egtrans: 我完全不能理解她为什么要离开他。

example.eg: She longed to go to the next village and beyond.
example.egtrans: 她渴望去到下一个村庄以及更远的地方。

example.eg: The climber stood at the top of the mountain and gazed into the beyond.
example.egtrans: 登山者在山顶伫立，眺望远方。

example.eg: The dying woman hoped to meet her beloved husband again in the beyond.
example.egtrans: 垂死的女子希望能在来世与今生挚爱的丈夫再次相遇。

example.eg: Nick wasn't willing to spend anything beyond twenty dollars.
example.egtrans: 超出20美元的东西尼克都不愿意买。

example.eg: To succeed, you must go beyond what the customer expects.
She went beyond the border.
Look beyond his looks; consider his personality.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 看远一些, 往远处看, 展望未来

example.eg: She always goes above and beyond what is expected of her.
example.egtrans: 她总是超出人们对她的期待。

dsense.name: above and beyond the call of duty, beyond the call of duty

example.eg: He was honored for performing above and beyond the call of duty.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 超出职责范围, 超越工作要求

example.eg: Why Janet stayed with her cheating husband is beyond all understanding.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 难以理解, 不可理解

example.eg: The amount of money some professional athletes earn is beyond belief.
The sweetness of her voice is beyond compare.
The countryside is lovely beyond compare.
The beautiful scenery is beyond comparison.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无可比拟, 无与伦比

dsense.name: beyond doubt, beyond a doubt, beyond the shadow of a doubt, beyond a shadow of a doubt

example.eg: This is beyond doubt the best song on the CD.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 毋庸置疑, 无可置疑

dsense.name: beyond doubt, beyond a doubt, beyond the shadow of a doubt, beyond a shadow of a doubt

example.eg: The theory of evolution is scientifically beyond doubt.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无疑的, 确信的, 无可怀疑的

example.eg: That film takes us to a world beyond imagination.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无可估量, 无法衡量

example.eg: His integrity is beyond question.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无可怀疑的, 毋庸置疑的, 毫无疑问的

example.eg: To avoid accidents, make sure that the appliance and its power cord are beyond reach of children.
We placed a mobile above the cot, just beyond reach, so the baby had to grab at it.
He proved that no dream was beyond reach if we were willing to work for it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 达不到的, 实现不了的

example.eg: Matt's alibi put him beyond suspicion.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 没有嫌疑的, 清白的
不可接受的, 出格的

example.eg: Quantum theory was beyond Simon's understanding.  What she sees in him is beyond understanding!
example.egtrans: 量子理论对于西蒙来说无法理解。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不可理解的, 无法理解的
